EmailTemplate.name: IS 2016 Industrial price Increase
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DuPont Protection Technologies
{!Account.Name} {!Account.BillingAddress}
December 3, 2015
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} :
Effective January 15, 2016, the North America Kevlar® fiber prices for Industrial end use applications will increase by 4.5%. (Please remember that all orders are priced at time of shipment not when they are placed.)
These increases will help support continued investment in productivity, material science, product development and our brands to help meet the needs and expectations of our customers and those who use these products in their daily lives.
Please be assured that DuPont Protection Technologies values our relationship with you and appreciates your continued use of DuPont products in the solutions you provide to help protect people.
Please confirm the receipt of this message and also let me know if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Beth L Taylor _______________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Technologies Account Manager DuPont™ Nomex®/ DuPont™ Kevlar® 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway, Spot 395 • Richmond VA 23234 Phone: (877) 713 -1299 or 804-383-2194 beth.l.taylor@dupont.com Nomex® and Kevlar® are registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
